name: Paper
description: A thin material made from plant fibers. Used for writing.

name: Printing Press
description: A machine for reproducing text and images.

name: Ink
description: A liquid used for printing and writing.

name: Type
description: A small block with a raised character. Used in printing.

name: Printed Book
description: A book produced using a printing press.

name: Compass
description: A navigational instrument using a magnetic needle.

name: Sextant
description: A navigational instrument for measuring angles.

name: Sail
description: A piece of fabric that captures wind for propulsion.

name: Sailing Ship
description: A ship powered by wind. Enables long-distance travel.

name: Galley
description: A ship powered by oars and sails.

name: Anchor
description: A heavy object for securing ships.

name: Rudder
description: A device for steering ships.

name: Mast
description: A tall pole that supports sails.

name: Rigging
description: Ropes and cables for supporting and controlling sails.

name: Port
description: A harbor for ships to dock and trade.

name: Lighthouse
description: A tower with a light for guiding ships.

name: Map
description: A detailed representation of geographical features.

name: Chart
description: A map specifically for navigation.

name: Spice
description: Aromatic substances used for flavoring and preservation.

name: Silk
description: A luxurious fabric made from silkworm cocoons.

name: Porcelain
description: A fine ceramic material. Highly valued.

name: Glass
description: A transparent material made from sand.

name: Glass Vessel
description: A container made from glass.

name: Stained Glass
description: Colored glass used in windows.

name: Mirror
description: A reflective surface made from glass.

name: Lens
description: A curved piece of glass that refracts light.

name: Microscope
description: A device for viewing very small objects.

name: Telescope
description: A device for viewing distant objects.

name: Clockwork Mechanism
description: A mechanical device using gears and springs.

name: Automaton
description: A self-operating machine. An early form of robot.

name: Mechanical Toy
description: A toy powered by clockwork.

name: Music Box
description: A device that plays music using a mechanism.

name: Organ
description: A musical instrument with pipes and keys.

name: Piano
description: A musical instrument with keys and strings.

name: Print
description: A reproduction of an image or text.

name: Engraving
description: An image carved into a surface.

name: Woodcut
description: An image carved into wood for printing.

name: Painting
description: Art created with pigments on a surface.

name: Sculpture
description: A three-dimensional work of art.

name: Architecture
description: The art of designing buildings.

name: Cathedral
description: A large church. A masterpiece of architecture.

name: Monastery
description: A building for religious communities.

name: University
description: An institution for higher learning.

name: Library
description: A building that houses books and knowledge.

name: Archive
description: A repository for historical records.

name: Manuscript
description: A handwritten document.

name: Codex
description: A bound book. An improvement over scrolls.

name: Scholarly Text
description: A written work of academic study.

name: Scientific Method
description: A systematic approach to inquiry.

name: Alchemy
description: An early form of chemistry. The precursor to modern science.
